text: Adaku Okoroafor (born 18 November 1974) is a Nigerian former footballforward player. She played for the Nigeria women's national football team. She was in the team for the 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup and 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:1995 FIFA Women's World Cup players
title: Adaku Okoroafor
